summary: A Romanian peasant, visiting a friend who is working at a hotel on the Black Sea Riviera, is mistaken for a look-alike rich American businessman.
cast: Amza Pellea|Draga Olteanu Matei|Jean Constantin|Stefan Mihailescu-Braila|Sebastian Papaiani|Puiu Calinescu|Stela Popescu|Stefan Banica|Vasilica Tastaman|Hamdi Cerchez|Adina Popescu|Stefan Thuri|Brandusa Manu|Corneliu Gîrbea|Mircea Albulescu|Colea Rautu|Gil Dobrica|Alexandru Dobrescu|Mihai Mãlaimare|Mariana Cerconi|Ion Polizache|Dan Tufaru|Vladimir Gaitan|Camelia Zorlescu|George Paul Avram|Rodica Mandache|Victor Strengaru|Petre Lupu|Rudy Rosenfeld|Ion Colan|Laurentiu Lazar|Mircea Cretu|Tamara Popescu|Brandusa Marioteanu
title: Nea Marin miliardar
